Class SignalHelper

java.lang.Object
  matrix.SignalHelper

public class SignalHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Includes all the functions for the implementation of the CoSaMP algorithm

Author:

Method Detail

cosampAlgo

public static org.apache.mahout.math.Matrix cosampAlgo(Signal sparse,
                                                       org.apache.mahout.math.Matrix measurementMatrix,
                                                       org.apache.mahout.math.Matrix phiMatrix,
                                                       int signalSparsity,
                                                       int iterations)
Implementation of cosamp algorithm, follows cosamp.m from the Rice Compressive Sensing toolbox.

Parameters:
sparse - - the sparse object that will be reconstructed from the CoSaMP algorithm.
measurementMatrix - - measurements taken to reconstruct the signal.
phiMatrix -
signalSparsity - - sparsity of the signal.
iterations - - max number of iterations for the algorithm.
Returns:
the reconstructed matrix

testBreakpoint

public static boolean testBreakpoint(org.apache.mahout.math.Matrix xCosampMatrix,
                                     int signalLength,
                                     int count)
Test to see if the algorithm should end now or if it should continue for more iterations

Parameters:
xCosampMatrix - - contains the column vector we are testing
signalLength - - length of the signal
count - - the specific iteration we are at
Returns:
true if the algorithm should end, false if it should continue
